title: Stirring Creatures: Holiday Special
description: Warning: This Village Series special holiday novella contains spoilers. The Village books 1-3 should be read first.  Christmas is coming in Singing Bear Village, but all is not jolly—at least for Christian. Though the other team members have met with Baz several times for work, when Christian gets assigned meetings, Baz never shows. Worried he’s offended their ambassador somehow, Christian seeks out Baz to see what the trouble is. But Baz’s answer is more than he bargained for.
author: Darien Cox
